resources.string:
" button you agree to the terms and conditions below: 
 
 1. The use of the application, developing ideas contained in the application and publication of ideas with the application are at your own risk. 
 2. In the event that the PROFITS from a product developed on the basis of an idea that was published with the application are bigger than 100,000$ - the developers of the product will owe 6,000$ to the user who published the idea. 
 3. In the event that a user of the application receives 6,000$ following term number 2, he will owe 1,000$ to the developers of this application(PitchIT)
